job.name: PostgreSQL_Service_Example
job.description: This workflow shows how to use PCA to ease deployment of service dependencies. Here, any PostgreSQL task needs PostgreSQL service. First, a bind_or_start_service task (Examples/5. Cloud Automation Task Templates), specifies the service we want to start, and an instance name, which is inherited by a job variable. Thus, PostgreSQL Task can use a "endpoint" variable where service is running. Everything is handled by the previous bind_or_start_service task. You can share PostgreSQL service reusing the same instance name.

task.name: Start_PostgreSQL_Service
task.description: Start the PostgreSQL server as a service.
